text: The M606, also called the Bradford South Radial Motorway, is a short motorway in West Yorkshire, England. It links Bradford with the M62. It is about long. ==Junctions== M606 motorway Southbound exits Junction Northbound exits Leeds, Hull, Huddersfield, Manchester M62 Dewsbury A638 Halifax A58 J1 Start of motorway Dewsbury A638 Leeds A58 Euroway Trading Estate J2 Euroway Trading Estate Start of motorway J3 Halifax A6036 Ring Road, City Centre A6177 ==References== Category:Motorways in England
title: M606 motorway
